text: Honey Traps, tactics to infiltrate the U.S. judicial system.
Today's verdict has created a deep crack in the cornerstone of the rule of law that the United States has been most proud of.
The ruling of the PAG case can no longer be overturned,
and the lawyers involved in the falsification will spend their lives paying the price.
Sean Wei-jen and PAG must be investigated by the Department of Justice and independent prosecutors,
and the U.S. Congress must be involved in investigating the truth.
Otherwise, the U.S. cannot afford the harm and price brought by the PAG case.
This is the only way that the United States and other Western civilized countries can take out the avirus,
hidden in their sick, body, and this avirus is the Chinese Communist Party.
On April 18, 2017, PAX, a subsidiary of the Pacific Alliance Group,
submitted a complaint against Mr. Miles Gould to the New York Court.
It is important to know that the complaint was that Mr. Miles Gould guaranteed a loan agreement between PENGU and PAX.
In fact, PAG has recognized that PENGU has paid off the loan.
So, the loan agreement should be automatically terminated, so as the guarantor agreement.
How can PAX submit a complaint of a terminated agreement?
Moreover, even if the loan agreement remains, the creditor PAG should first demand the payment from PENGU,
not the guarantor Mr. Miles Gould.
Not only that, the place of the issuance and execution of the so-called guarantor agreement
and the residence of both parties are either China or Hong Kong,
which are not within the jurisdiction of the New York Court.
The complaint was rejected by New York Court in September 2017.
However, the complaint was accepted for rehearing in April 2018.
The only reason given was that Mr. Miles Gould purchased a property in New York City at that time.
PAG started a four-year legal battle against Mr. Miles Gould.
Since the case was accepted, Edward Moss has served as the main lawyer representing PAG.
In the past four years, Edward Moss submitted a large amount of unverifiable evidence from China to the court
and even documents with forged Mr. Miles Gould's signature.
What's more is the New York Court deprived Mr. Miles Gould's right to a jury trial without giving any reason.
It was astounding that facing a flood of falsified evidence,
the New York judge barred Mr. Miles Gould from questioning the veracity of any document.
Something even more dramatic happened in October 2021.
Edward Moss accepted an invitation from attorney Bradley Bondi to join Cahill LLP.
He is the lawyer who once represented Mr. Miles Gould in cases, including GTV.
Bradley Bondi, as Mr. Miles Gould's former legal advisor, ignored professional ethics for lawyers,
invited Edward Moss to fight side by side,
and used the confidential information obtained when he served as Mr. Miles Gould's lawyer to attack Mr. Miles Gould.
Mr. Miles Gould's team of lawyers asked the three most authoritative lawyers' professional ethics evaluation agencies in the United States to give an evaluation,
and finally found that Edward Moss seriously violated professional ethics.
On January 14, 2022, the court ruled that the conflict of interest of PAG lawyers was established,
and the attorney's qualification of the case representation must be lifted.
Moss, who represented PAG for five years, was disqualified according to law.
However, the falsified evidence he provided for the past five years has led the court to find Mr. Miles Gould for a total of $134 million.
In general, the penalty for a guarantor who guarantees a loan agreement of $30 million is not more than double the value of the original loan.
Such a high penalty of nearly five times is never heard.
Furthermore, the court even ruled the property on the 18th floor of 781 New York Avenue and the Lady Mae cruise ship,
which do not belong to Mr. Miles Gould, to pay for the fines.
Yes, this is how things happen.
Why are so many top American lawyers willing to work for the CCP and even risk their reputation and future?
The center of the problems is the CCP's infiltration over years using blackmailing, bribery, honey traps, tactics, and China's huge market.
Almost all Chinese companies are controlled by the CCP.
Moss has law firms in Beijing's Yintai area and Shanghai's financial district.
As long as these elites collude with the CCP, they can easily access China's well-known companies, such as Alibaba.
Behind this are massive interests, collusion, and corruption.
What is the relationship between PAG and the Chinese Communist Party?
Sean Weijian, the chairman and CEO of PAG, was born in 1954 in Beijing to a family of members of the Foreign Ministry,
which is known to be Communist China's intelligence agency.
In 1975, during the Cultural Revolution, he wrote a letter to Mao Zedong and Zhou Enlai to express his loyalty and gain the opportunity to return to the city to study.
It has always been the rule of the Communist Party to only promote who has good roots, one of our own.
Being a member of a family of Foreign Ministry, Sean Weijian was sent to study in the United States in 1982.
He became the first foreign student from Red China in the history of the University of San Francisco.
He was also one of the first group of agents infiltrating the West.
He then became the promoter of China's Thousand Talents program to steal science and technology from the world.
In 1998, Sean Weijian joined New Bridge Capital as a founding partner.
Sean took only 12 years to become chairman and CEO of PAG in 2010.
Sean's first successful investment project was Hainan-Sanya Scenics Airport, which is part of HNA Group.
When the CCP learned that Mr. Miles Gould started to expose the scandals of Wang Qishan and HNA Group on April 19, 2017,
PAG's Sean Weijian was ordered to launch legal actions against Mr. Miles Gould one day earlier.
All the evidence points to one conclusion that PAG is the Hong Kong version of HNA Group,
and Sean Weijian is the henchman for Wang Qishan and other kleptocratic families to launder and hide money overseas.
The PAG case is a typical example of the CCP's infiltration and corruption of the Western judicial system.
The CCP uses it to set back Mr. Miles Gould's efforts in taking down the CCP.
The CCP has mastered the so-called two-gun, or even the multi-gun, tactic to perfection.
Ever since Mr. Miles Gould launched the whistleblower movement to take down the CCP in 2007,
the CCP has not only used the power of its sleepers overseas to pursue legal action against Mr. Miles Gould,
but also used Westerners who have been controlled by CCP's blackmail, bribery, and honey trap
to influence the US federal government's decisions with the intention of achieving the evil goal of deporting Mr. Miles Gould.
A classic example of this is the involvement of George Higginbotham,
a senior congressional affairs counselor of the Department of Justice,
and Elliott Broidy, an American venture capitalist.
In a covert campaign to influence the US government for the interests of the CCP,
George Higginbotham was the first US Justice Department attorney to be criminally charged for corruption.
He has accepted bribes from Joe Lowe, who has a Chinese communist background,
and helped him launder money and funnel benefits to Elliott Broidy's lobbying with the goal of deporting Mr. Miles Gould.
Both people confessed to their crimes.
In the past five years of the whistleblower movement,the CCP has never stopped personal attacks and disinformation of Mr. Miles Gould.
Now, the CCP uses the power of one country to get a verdict that requires Mr. Miles Gould
to provide a huge fine of $134 million within five days.
Mr. Miles Gould has made a huge decision that he would rather file for personal bankruptcy than settle.
The American juridical system is not perfect, but it is still the most balanced system that can self-correct mistakes.
This is what makes America great.
The PAG case is the best example of the Chinese communist party's blackmail, bribery, and honey traps.
Tactics who infiltrate the U.S. judicial system.
Today's verdict has created a deep crack in the cornerstone of the rule of law that the United States has been most proud of.
The ruling of the PAG case can no longer be overturned, and the lawyers involved in the falsification will spend their lives paying the price.
Sean Weijian and PAG must be investigated by the Department of Justice and independent prosecutors, and the U.S. Congress must be involved in investigating the truth.
Otherwise, the U.S. cannot afford the harm and price brought by the PAG case.
This is the only way that the United States and other Western civilized countries can take out the avirus hidden in their sick, body, and this avirus is the Chinese communist party.

这个案件到现在并没有结束。
就是419特别节目太平联盟案例。
太平联盟与文贵先生合作只有一次,而且仅仅一次。
一,太平联盟在2008年借款给盘古一个亿美元,用三套公寓做抵押,文贵先生是这笔借款担保人之一。
二,这是文贵先生和太平联盟的第一次也是最后一次法律关系。
三,而后太平联盟与北京盘古的商业往来,文贵先生并没有参与。

证据显示,这笔借款实际上已经偿还或者说太平联盟有机会获得偿还,还因为自身的原因没有实现还款。
在此情况下,太平联盟已经放弃对郭先生的担保责任。
从太平联盟的第一份诉状里,我们知道盘古被国安查封是触发合同违约的根本原因。
第三个要素,这是盘古的责任。

PAG需要提供证据一,是郭先生的行为直接导致盘古违约。
这是他们需要提供的证据。
我相信至今他们提不出这个证据来。
第二,PAG也就是太平联盟,需提供证据。
二,太平联盟在盘古违约后为了减少或彻底避免,由此带来的损失做了最大努力。
那么事实是否真的如此呢?
根据太平联盟内部的邮件显示,北京警方曾主动请求帮助其获得盘古的房产。
也就是说太平联盟只要给北京警察点个头,就能挽回因无法获得公寓而造成的损失。
而太平联盟对这一选项并没有做任何行动,甚至都没有考虑,而是选择了用法律手段讨债。
事实上是,太平联盟向法庭递交了极有可能是造假的担保合同。
法庭一直拒绝郭先生要求对这一合同间别真假的基本诉求。
这一系列的问题的事实。
1.盘古是否违约?违约责任是否在郭先生?

3.太平联盟在庭上出具的担保合同是否真实?等等。
在美国的法庭上,这些问题都应该由陪审团来决定的,而非法官个人决定。
